text: Herman Otto Hellwig (30 June 1875 – 5 August 1952) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Herman Hellwig's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1875 births Category:1952 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Herman Hellwig
